CustomField.description: Intended to be a temporary field for May 2020 de-duping project due to iMIS records that were first imported to Fonteva, then later merged and deleted in iMIS before go-live. This field and its contents can be removed by 12/31/2020.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Was designated as master record for duplicates in iMIS
CustomField.label: Is Legacy System Master
